content:
While some pieces of graffiti can be true artistic masterpieces of modern expression; others are just plain hysterical.
We've all seen them. A vandalized sign or a silly scribble in a bathroom stall, these works of guerrilla art serve to brighten our otherwise banal days. 
These pieces may not have taken a lot of time or talent but they are certainly clever.
So maybe you find this scratchy form of street art immature, simple or even stupid. Just be glad someone is attempting to make you laugh for once, instead of just trying to sell you something.
title: 5 Ridiculous Pieces of Graffiti That'll Make You Laugh
author: Tiana Miller
